participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, Lily loves to connect with others through music and gaming.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Jack is practical and dependable, with a deep love for animals and a strong work ethic.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd named barnaby. i am employed by the us postal service. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar.

content.text: Hello! Do you like doing tests?
